titleStmt.title: Popish treachery, or, A short and new account of the horrid cruelties exercised on the Protestants in France being a true prospect of what is to be expected from the most solemn promises of Roman Catholick princes / in a letter from a gentleman of that nation, to one in England, and by him made English.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman of that nation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
